name: Cyberpunk Carp Killer
description:
Cyberpunk Carp Killer - made by Matt Smith (soupermatty) for Idle Thumbs 'Wizard' Game Jam 2015.

DESCRIPTION:
This was mostly a project to learn Unity - I bit off more than I could chew, for sure :)
Sooo many planned features I didn't get done before the deadline - but I learned a lot about Unity, so it was worthwhile for me.

Music is "Dubna 48K" from Patrick R on the idle forums, https://soundcloud.com/wizard-jam-sound-bank/dubna...
https://www.idlethumbs.net/forums/topic/10053-wiza...
Thanks dude!

This project was based on the Unity 2D Roguelike tutorial that I did to familiarise myself with the framework - some (tweaked) assets still remain from that tute, sorry if that's a bit uncool for a game jam but I ran out of time! I believe all assets not made by myself are CC0 / public domain / otherwise freely distributable. Please let me know if that's not the case.

Have fun, punks!

http://itch.io/jam/wizard-jam
http://soupermatty.itch.io/cyberpunk-carp-killer
smith.matty@gmail.com

QUICK REFERENCE:
Arrow keys to move.
Move towards object to attack it.
You cannot attack the zombies, you must avoid those!
M - map overlay
T - play/pause tunes
ESC - quit
Enter/Space - confirm
